props.description: If `true` disabled folders items can be opened
If `true` disabled items can be selected
If `true` mounts tree with all nodes opened
If `true` mounts tree with root node opened
Base name of the component for styling
Attributes of v-chevron (open indicator) component. See documentation for valid values
String used to filter items
Name of the property that hold name of array of children
Name of the property for disabled items. Disabling folder also disable all of its children
Name of the property that hold name of item's icon. Valid name is the same as for v-icon name prop
Name of the required property that hold unique value for every item.
Name of the property that hold name of item
Array of tree items
If `true` clicking on labels opens folders. Clicking indicators always opens folders
Default icon for folders if no icon is provided in items prop. If value is `array` then icons are respectively for closed and opened folders
Default icon for items if no icon is provided in `items` prop
If `true` folders and items can be selected independently. By default selecting folders selects all children items and selecting every children selects parent folder
If `true` @input:selected return array of item keys. If `false` (default) this event returns `array` of item `objects`
Displays checkboxes
Displays icons if icon or placeholder icon is set
Displays open indicators
Folder element
Icon element
Item element
Sets animation effect when opening or closing folders. Valid values are: 'fade', 'fade-slide', or `empty string` to disable animations.
Variant of the component styles

events.description: Fired when item is selected. Passes array of selected items

slots.description: Slot for complete customization of appearance of items. Other slots are unavailable when using this slot
Slot for content that prepends item name
Slot for content that is appended to item name

functions.description: Opens all nodes on level (0 for root, any high number to open all nodes)
